Product Requirements Document: "Meetup" Landing Page for Pet-Friendly Locations
Overview

Create a prototype landing page for a new service called "Meetup", designed to help pet owners discover, share, and join meetups at pet-friendly locations. The page should be simple, visually appealing, and communicate the core value proposition quickly.

Objectives

Present the idea of "Meetup" for pet owners seeking pet-friendly places and events.

Collect email signups from interested users (early access/waitlist).

Highlight features and benefits of using the service.

Simple, easy to navigate, and optimized for mobile and desktop.

Features
1. Hero Section

Headline: Clear and catchy, e.g. “Connect with Pet Lovers at Pet-Friendly Places!”

Subheadline: Brief description, e.g. “Discover, share, and join pet-friendly meetups near you.”

Visual: Illustration or photo representing pets and people at a meetup.

Signup Form: Input for email, with a “Notify Me” or “Join Waitlist” button.
